description: Advanced section of the chart service

image_pull_secrets.description: Map of all the image pull secrets for the container image to be pulled from the repository. Each map should have name specified within it. For more information refer to: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/pull-image-private-registry/#create-a-pod-that-uses-your-secret

node_selector.description: Map of all node selectors for the application
